title: Add new 64 sizes for avatars

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet MVP
labels.description: Design system components, initial research and page wireframes

body:
# Feature Issue

### Description

The QR code component has been fixed [in figma](https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=17928-209739&mode=design&t=uBOjm2jYssWHVSQw-4), now the avatars inside them are pointing to the corresponding components. it means new variants (of size 64) have been added.

These are the new designs:

[User avatar](https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=28332-1636&mode=design&t=uBOjm2jYssWHVSQw-4)

[Account avatar](https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=28174-1966&mode=design&t=uBOjm2jYssWHVSQw-4)

[Channel avatar](https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=28351-1662&mode=design&t=uBOjm2jYssWHVSQw-4)

[Wallet avatar](https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=114-7665&mode=design&t=uBOjm2jYssWHVSQw-4)

We need to implement them and use them inside the share > QR code component (it just requires to change the given size, which is 32 atm).



### Acceptance Criteria

- The new sizes look as designs
- The QR code component is updated to use the new sizes
- Update their respective preview screens to properly show the new size added.
